channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tish Cyrus Reveals Christmas Plans for Her and Husband Dominic Purcell's Blended Family: 'Keeps Looking Different'
item.description: The Cyrus matriarch and Purcell have nine children altogether, five of them belonging to her and four to him
